subject: Interview Invitation for Marketing Specialist Role at NovaTech Inc.
body:
Hi Emily,

Thank you for your interest in the Marketing Specialist position at NovaTech Inc. We were impressed with your background and would like to invite you to participate in an interview.

The interview is scheduled for Wednesday, March 13 at 2:00 PM EST and will be conducted via phone. You will be meeting with Michael Lee, Director of Marketing, who will walk you through the role and answer any questions you may have.

Please let us know if this date and time work for you, or feel free to suggest alternative availability.

Best regards,
Ava Kim
Recruiting Coordinator
NovaTech Inc.
intent: Invite the candidate to interview and confirm availability
